programme.title: Arsenal vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: In all competitions, Arsenal have won their last six home games against Nottingham Forest by an aggregate score of 19-2. The Gunners are unbeaten in 14 games on home soil against Forest since a 3-1 defeat back in March 1989. Nottingham Forest have won just two out of 16 Premier League matches against Arsenal and both wins came at the City Ground, in 1996-97 and 2022-23.

programme.title: Chelsea vs. Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Chelsea have lost just 8.3% of their Premier League games against Fulham, the joint-lowest loss rate one side has against another with a minimum of 20 meetings. Fulham won this exact fixture 2-1 last season, ending a 21-game winless streak away to Chelsea in all competitions. They’ve never won consecutive visits to Stamford Bridge in their history.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Brighton and Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4
programme.desc: This is the first meeting between Crystal Palace and Sunderland since February 2017 in the Premier League – the Black Cats won 4-0 at Selhurst Park. programme.title: Fulham vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4
programme.desc: Fulham have lost just one of their five home Premier League matches against Leeds United, going down 2-1 in 2020-21 under Scott Parker. The last four Premier League meetings between Fulham and Leeds have produced 18 goals, with both sides finding the net in each match. Leeds won both games in 2020-21, while Fulham completed a double in 2022-23.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4
programme.desc: Newcastle United have lost just two of their 20 Premier League matches against Wolves, a defeat percentage of just 10% - their lowest against any side they’ve faced at least 20 times in the competition. Wolverhampton Wanderers have won just one of their last 22 away top-flight visits to Newcastle, winning 2-1 in December 2018 under Nuno Espírito Santo. In 43 away games at the Magpies in the top division, Wolves have just two clean sheets, with those coming in 1899 and 1974.

programme.title: Everton vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4
programme.desc: Everton are winless in their last 12 Premier League matches against Aston Villa, all since Villa returned to the competition in 2019-20. It is Villa’s longest ever run of away league clean sheets against a single opponent.

programme.title: Canada vs USA - 3rd Place - 2025 FIBA AmeriCup
programme.desc: Bronze is on the line after a quick turnaround. The USA are record AmeriCup winners with seven titles, while Canada are chasing a statement podium. The senior series favors the USA 21–2, although the most recent major clash flipped the script: Canada beat the USA 127–118 after overtime for 2023 World Cup bronze in Manila. Their last AmeriCup meeting was the 2022 bronze game, which the USA won 84–80. Current FIBA Men’s World Ranking: USA No. 1, Canada No. 6. Bench depth, defensive rebounding, and three-point efficiency are likely to separate them.

programme.title: Argentina vs Brazil - Final - 2025 FIBA AmeriCup
programme.desc: South America’s classic rivalry decides the AmeriCup. Argentina are the reigning champions with three titles (2001, 2011, 2022), while Brazil are four-time winners (1984, 1988, 2005, 2009). Argentina lead the senior head-to-head 25–17. Their last AmeriCup meeting was the 2022 final in Recife, which Argentina won 75–73; at the 2019 World Cup second round, Argentina won 87–73. Current FIBA Men’s World Ranking: Argentina No. 8, Brazil No. 12. Expect a tactical game where turnover margin, second-chance points, and late free throws decide it.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Martin DI NENNO ARG Leandro ROMAN AUGSBURGUER ARG - Men’s Fin
programme.desc: Madrid sets the stage for a thrilling men’s final at the 2025 Premier Padel P1. Top seeds Arturo Coello and Agustín Tapia, the reigning powerhouse duo blending Spanish flair with Argentine precision, take on the all-Argentine pair Martín Di Nenno and Leandro Augsburger. A clash of styles is guaranteed: Coello’s dominance at the net and Tapia’s explosive creativity tested by Di Nenno’s defensive wizardry and Augsburger’s fearless power. The ultimate battle for the P1 crown.

programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. New World No.1s Gemma Triay/Delfi Brea meet Marta Ortega/Tamara Icardo with the Paris crown and 2,000 FIP points at stake. Triay/Brea reached the final after outlasting Ustero/Araujo; Ortega/Icardo ousted Sánchez/Josemaría in a statement win. Expect Triay/Brea’s aggressive shifts and overhead control against Ortega/Icardo’s structured patterns and backhand-volley accuracy. Net duels and smart lobs will tell.

programme.desc: The world’s fastest riders chase pole position at Misano in MotoGP qualifying. Precision braking, explosive acceleration, and razor-thin margins decide who starts at the front in the premier class, with every tenth of a second carrying championship implications.

programme.title: Sprint Race - San Marino - Moto GP - 2025
programme.desc: The MotoGP sprint at Misano offers pure intensity. Shorter, faster, and unforgiving, riders unleash maximum pace from the start, knowing there’s no time to recover. Fierce duels and bold overtakes define the fight for crucial championship points.

programme.title: Main Race - San Marino - Moto GP - 2025
programme.desc: The San Marino Grand Prix delivers the ultimate MotoGP showdown at Misano. The world’s elite battle over full race distance with strategy, stamina, and raw speed on display, as riders chase victory and vital championship momentum under immense pressure.

programme.title: Arturo Coello (Esp) Agustin Tapia (Arg) vs Alejandro Galan (Esp) Federico Chingotto (Arg) - Men - Fi
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. World No.1s Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia face No.2 Alejandro Galán/Fede Chingotto for Major glory and 2,000 FIP points. Coello/Tapia arrive after straight sets win over Stupaczuk/Lebron; Galán/Chingotto advanced by shutting down Yanguas/Nieto. Expect Coello/Tapia’s aerial power vs Galán/Chingotto’s countering and first-volley precision. Serve+1 and bandeja depth decide.

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Sachsenring
programme.desc: DTM. The embodiment of Motorsport tradition. Having just turned 40, the DTM combines a unique fascination and familiarity with an unmistakable dynamic, signified by the rebranding with a new logo! Seven different manufacturers – ten different winners on six brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) through twelve races are but one testament to the unique competitive balance that makes every DTM weekend a revelation! And with the addition of Ford, the palette of different brands is only increasing!

programme.title: West Ham United vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last seven Premier League matches against Tottenham Hotspur, a 2-1 away win in December 2023. Each of the last three Premier League meetings between West Ham and Spurs at the London Stadium have ended as 1-1 draws – Spurs are winless in five league visits since a 3-2 win in November 2019.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Valencia - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have not lost any of their last 10 matches against Valencia in LaLiga, their second-best unbeaten run against Los Che in their history in the competition, after a run of 13 matches between 2007 and 2013. Valencia have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 21 away games against FC Barcelona in LaLiga, since a 1-0 win in October 2003 under Rafa Benítez, their worst current run without keeping a clean sheet against the same opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Real Madrid - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have lost their last four LaLiga matches against Real Madrid, failing to score in the last three. The San Sebastián side have never lost four consecutive matches without scoring against Los Blancos in the history of the competition. Real Madrid have won 12 of the 21 matches they have played at Anoeta against Real Sociedad in LaLiga in the 21st Century, becoming the away team with the most wins at the San Sebastian sides ground in the competition since then.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: In all competitions, Arsenal have won their last six home games against Nottingham Forest by an aggregate score of 19-2. The Gunners are unbeaten in 14 games on home soil against Forest since a 3-1 defeat back in March 1989. Nottingham Forest have won just two out of 16 Premier League matches against Arsenal and both wins came at the City Ground, in 1996-97 and 2022-23.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/26 - Ep.15 Edwin Van Der Sar
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping.

programme.title: Espanyol vs Mallorca - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 4
programme.desc: Espanyol have won their last six home games against Mallorca in LaLiga, their current best run of consecutive home wins against the same opponent in the competition. programme.title: Burnley vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Burnley have lost 14 of their 18 Premier League matches against Liverpool, including each of their last five in a row since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021. Liverpool have won eight of their nine away Premier League matches at Turf Moor against Burnley, winning the last six in a row. The Reds have won seven away top-flight games in a row against three teams previously: West Brom, Norwich and Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester City have won five of their last eight Premier League matches against Manchester United, though they failed to win either game last season for the first time since 2020-21. Manchester United have inflicted 25% of Pep Guardiola’s total home Premier League defeats as Man City manager, with the Red Devils winning four times there against the Spaniard. They are looking for consecutive wins at the Etihad for the first time since March 2021.

programme.title: Al Shamal vs Al Arabi - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W4
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Kaiser - Handball Documentary

programme.title: Saint-Raphaël vs PSG - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Nikola karabatic 20 Years Of Glory
programme.desc: Renowned as one of the greatest handball players of the century, Nikola retires on May 31 after his final game with PSG Handball. His career concludes with the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. A four-time World Champion, three-time Olympic gold medalist, and three-time World Handball Player of the Year, Nikola plans to take a break from his career to spend more time with his family.
